extendedInfo.description: ---About the Game---Splice is an experimental and artistic puzzler. Immerse yourself in its microbial world and start splicing! Every level ("strand") consists of a number of cells that you will need to rearrange into a target structure in several moves ("splices"). Exploration and experimentation are key in determining how the curious little cells react to each other. Predict the sequence of splices you'll have to make in order to successfully arrange each strand. Re-sequence, mutate, and splice your way through this unique puzzle experience, and you'll exercise your ability to visualize sequential series of shapes over time. Solve your way to the final strands and you'll be left with a heady sense of mental accomplishment!Splice is the fourth title out of Cipher Prime Studios, and was the Best Puzzle Game winner of the 2011 Intel Level Up contest.---Key Features---75+ Puzzles: The main sequences introduce the player to the game's basic mechanics and the epilogue sequences challenge the player's mastery of the game.Angelic Solutions: Every level is solved in a few moves. Challenge yourself and find the angelic solutions of puzzles by completing puzzles in fewer splices than you're given. Novice players can still progress through the game by using all splices.Unique Geometry: Explore the structure of a binary tree in radial space.Absorbing Soundscape: Put your headphones on and lose yourself in Splice's hauntingly beautiful and Glass-ian piano music.Compelling Colors: Massage your retinas with the soothing visual effects and ambience of this primordial puzzle environment.

reviews.title: Awsome
reviews.comment: Dont listen to any bad comment. Everything is just as it should be. Well done dev team it was worth the hours of coding.
reviews.author: Harun \305\236akir Oral

reviews.title: Great movement
reviews.comment: Love this well designed puzzle game. Movement is fluid, looks great. Runs as well on my Tegra 3 powered tablet as on my Note II.
reviews.author: stuart hirshhorn

reviews.title: Amazing game
reviews.comment: This game is a very unique and challenging, and despite what some say it actually follows some very simple mechanics. One of the best puzzle games I have ever played.
reviews.author: Sam Carlin

reviews.title: Wow
reviews.comment: Amazing Graphics. Splice is like awesome. Really makes you think. Good for long slow days to keep you busy. Also keeps crashing when I open it. Plz fix
reviews.author: Travis Frausto

reviews.title: So engrossing!
reviews.comment: Top graphics,  really smooth, and brilliant music to match every level! I love everything about this game. I wish I had found it sooner. Worth every freaking penny I spent on this. You\'re in for a real treat people. Get this now!
reviews.author: Andrea Ruiz

reviews.title: Best game ever!!!
reviews.comment: Easily one of the best games I have ever played on mobile. Fantastic graphics and superb audio
reviews.author: Evan Hildebrandt

reviews.title: This game impressed me.
reviews.comment: awesome puzzle. but, user interface not good enough.
reviews.author: En SandOrca

reviews.title: Simply amazing
reviews.comment: The gameplay is simple and genius all at once. The graphics are immersive. And that background music... Holy crap I could listen to that all night long.    Bravo. Brav...friggin...o.
reviews.author: Christopher Banks

reviews.title: Great game if you have a little persistence
reviews.comment: ... but please add \'cloud save\' for users with multiple devices.
reviews.author: Justin Davis

reviews.title: Interesting concept and game play
reviews.comment: Needs to think before making moves. Simple and yet requires complex thinking to solve. Thanks for the move to SD lol that took months
reviews.author: Marcus Ong

reviews.title: Short & Sweet
reviews.comment: The first 3/4 of the game feels like practice for the really challenging stuff. Great concept, i\'m a big fan of the game\'s mechanics. Would like to see more of the more difficult puzzles is all...
reviews.author: Andrew Schrump

reviews.title: It\'s unique
reviews.comment: Beautiful interface. Soothing music. In today\'s world of fast paced and simple games, Splice is an irony. One cannot understand this game unless they play it and more than that every has a different which adds in the challenge of first understanding the level and then conquering. This removes the monotony of levels to great extent.
reviews.author: Swapnil Rastogi

reviews.title: Beautiful
reviews.comment: It\'s so perfect I want to cry.  So different from most games.  I love it.  Please don\'t see discouraged by bad comments. Credits to the developer.
reviews.author: Navya M

reviews.title: Gorgeous, Challenging AND Fun
reviews.comment: This game is mind-bogglingly phenomenal. Take some time to pay attention to how things work and you should be able to pick it up inside ten minutes. The music/sound blend seamlessly together, and this game\'s aesthetic is beyond anything else I\'ve played on a touchscreen, ever. If I could rate this game six stars, I would.
reviews.author: Adam Harrison

reviews.title: Beautiful
reviews.comment: Graphically beautiful but crashes way to much   I can\'t even play the game because it crashes  When I drag my finger across the screen it crashes and just exits I await the next update that I hope will bring a fix for this
reviews.author: Zach Alden

reviews.title: Perfect for mobile.
reviews.comment: Originally almost bought this on my PC. Thought it would be perfect for mobile and thankfully they developed it for Android. Solid controls and excellent gameplay.
reviews.author: Kiam Kweli

reviews.title: Fantastic game but
reviews.comment: absolutely needs support for Google Games. I get tired of having 3 different versions at 3 different locations; let me sync my devices under one unified cloud save, please!
reviews.author: Derek Ovenshire

reviews.title: Challenging
reviews.comment: If you love a game that offers unique challenges and infuriating puzzles, then there is little doubt that you\'ll enjoy Splice. Very intellectually stimulating gameplay.
reviews.author: Richard Ralston

reviews.title: Amazing
reviews.comment: The game is highly addictive and puzzling. Simple design and controls. Fantastic soundtrack.
reviews.author: Gabriel Andrade
